p: Each plot in Fig. 2 includes a trend line (as well as the decadal trend) for the observations over the period 1961–2016. As shown in Fig. 2, TX95 values computed from observations exhibit an increasing trend especially in northern SA (see Fig. 2a–c). TX95 values from observations at latitudes higher than 20°S (see Fig. 2d–i) exhibit a less strong trend (particularly in the case of coastal locations in the Atacama Desert; see Fig. 2d).
